name: Summer Fruit Park
description:
Welcome to Summer Fruit Farm!

Embark on an adventurous journey: beat pop-bubble levels, management your own fruit farm!
Collect fruits, trucks will transport them all over the world!
Make juices, children will come in groups to taste!

Pay attention to the animals who come to the farm to make trouble, ensure your fruits is safe!

Game features:
✔ Addictive gameplay: pop bubbles, expand farm, attract customers, and wish you a prosperous business!
✔ Hundreds of unique pop-bubble levels
✔ Enjoy the awesomeness about slicing fruit
✔ Release your pressure, relax your body and mind
✔ Simple and smooth operation
✔ Beautiful pictures
✔ Harmonious  music

This wonderful idle+bubble game can satisfy your desire to run a farm, and also allows you to experience the magic of match-3 games! And the thrill of fruit-slicing!

Download now and enjoy hundreds of hours!

Liked the game?

Your reviews/ratings are very important to us, and they’ll help us bring you free updates with more great features and exciting new games!
